title: Lightning Carrot
summaries: The Lightning Carrot is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Volt Bunny pet to follow the player around. While flying to keep pace with the player, the Volt Bunny emits a decent amount of light while moving erratically, which can spread light over an area. If there are no available tiles for the pet to "sit" on, like when climbing walls or flying, the Volt Bunny will constantly jump around too. The Lightning Carrot can be purchased from the Zoologist for 50 GC after completing 50% (270 entries) of the Bestiary.
